meanings.definition: The act or process of dividing into compartments.
meanings.sent1: The compartmentation of the classroom into study areas helps students focus.
meanings.sent2: The compartmentation of the toolbox makes it easy to find the right tool.
meanings.sent3: The compartmentation of the fridge led to a comical mix-up of food items.
meanings.sent4: Her mind's compartmentation of work and personal life was like separate worlds.
meanings.sent5: The compartmentation of the bookshelves by genre made browsing enjoyable.
